channel.title: PJ's Uber-Cool News Feed!
channel.description: Get news about PJ's projects and whereabouts.

item.title: I have a second site now!
item.description: You can check it out at lewolfyt.neocities.org! Check out all of my projects, including a weather app based on the Forecast Channel for the Wii!
item.author: PJ

item.title: I'm a Wii homebrew developer now!
item.description:
I've been working on a new game for The Homebrew Channel! You heard it here first - It'll be a multiplayer Vs/Co-Op compilation of some legally distinct classic arcade games!
Games will include: Brick Breaker, Chompers, Space Blasters, Road Rally, and a few more shameless rip-off titles!
Check out a development screenshot!
item.author: PJ

item.title: PJ's Update: May 15, 2024
item.description: I'll attach a photo of this later, but I've been working on a Wii homebrew solution: The Cii-4! It contains a ton of useful homebrew apps and utilities, all hinging on LetterBomb.
item.author: PJ

item.title: New RSS Feed!
item.description: I've set up this new RSS feed that you can view with your own RSS reader! I'll post about projects and such that I'm working on.
item.author: PJ
